en: He has changed a lot, and he is no longer what he used to be.
zh: 他变了很多，已经不是以前的他了。

en: Since he is very late, he may have met with an accident on his way.
zh: 既然他很晚了，可能在路上遇到了意外。

en: He was fined five pounds for drunken driving.
zh: 他因酒后驾车被罚款五英镑。

en: He was drunk and his speech was thick.
zh: 他喝醉了，说话含糊不清。

en: He was too drunk to remember to shut the back door.
zh: 他喝得太醉了，以至于忘记关后门。

en: He was drunk and forgot to shut the back door.
He is a little high.
He is out of control when drunk.
He will drive home, though he is drunk.
zh: 他喝醉了也要开车回家。

en: He is too drunk to drive home.
zh: 他醉得太厉害了，没法开车回家。

en: He carried on at his work eventually.
zh: 他最终坚持完成了他的工作。

en: He finally succeeded in climbing that mountain.
zh: 他终于成功登上了那座山。

en: He hoped to be a sailor.
He didn't meet the standards.
He used water colors in short vertical brush-strokes.
zh: 他用短而垂直的笔触画水彩画。

en: He is adept in swimming.
He has built up his health through swimming.
zh: 他通过游泳增强了体质。

en: He holds a record in swimming.
He didn't care for swimming.
He is a good swimmer and also plays tennis well.
zh: 他游泳很好，而且网球也打得好。

en: He can't swim.
He cannot swim.
He left the water running.
He must have left the water running.
zh: 他一定是忘了关水龙头了。

en: He drank three glasses of water.
He is tremendously handsome.
He asked for a drink of water.
He dived into the water and came up for air.
zh: 他跳入水中，然后浮出水面呼吸。

en: He jumped into the water.
He took some deep breaths before he dived.
zh: 他潜水前深吸了几口气。

en: He drank the whisky as if it were water.
zh: 他喝威士忌就像喝水一样。

en: He jumped across the puddle.
He amused himself by reading a detective story.
zh: 他通过阅读侦探小说来消遣。

en: He reads detective stories on occasion.
He belongs to the brass band.
He had the nerve to say that.
zh: 他竟然有胆量说那样的话。

en: Does he still have that book he borrowed from the library?
zh: 他还留着从图书馆借的那本书吗？

en: He still hasn't returned the book he borrowed from the library.
zh: 他还没还从图书馆借的那本书。

en: He explained by means of diagrams.
He illustrated his theory with diagrams.
zh: 他用图表来说明他的理论。

en: He lives in a farmhouse remote from the world.
zh: 他住在一个远离尘世的农舍里。

en: Living as he did in the remote countryside, he seldom came into town.
zh: 由于他住在偏远的乡村，他很少进城。

en: He lived in a house remote from the village.
zh: 他住在一个远离村庄的房子里。

en: He was praised for saving a life.
zh: 他因救人一命而受到赞扬。

en: He was proud that he was selected by the people.
zh: 他很自豪自己被人民选中。

en: He was a god to his people.
He is an authority on the humanities.
zh: 他是人文科学方面的权威。

en: He cannot afford the common comforts of life.
zh: 他负担不起普通的生活必需品。

en: He's fed up with socializing.
She is not so much unsociable as bashful.
zh: 她与其说是不善交际，不如说是害羞。

en: He doesn't mix well.
He is an agreeable person.
He is used to speaking in public.
He's used to speaking in public.
He is accustomed to speaking in public.
He said he wasn't used to speaking in public.
zh: 他说他不习惯公开演讲。

en: He hasn't said anything publicly, but in confidence he told me he's getting married.
zh: 他还没有公开说过什么，但私下里他告诉我他要结婚了。

en: He was laughed at in public.
He was dressed down in public.
He has seen much of the world.
He sees all life in terms of money.
zh: 他把一切都看成是金钱。

en: He has a notion that life is a voyage.
zh: 他认为人生是一场旅行。

en: He lived abroad for much of his life.
zh: 他一生中大部分时间都住在国外。

en: He was brought up against the realities of life.
zh: 他被迫面对生活的现实。

en: Life passed him by.
He was a brave warrior who had spent most of his life fighting his enemies.
zh: 他是一位勇敢的战士，一生大部分时间都在与敌人作战。

en: His life was full of drama.
zh: 他的一生充满了戏剧性。

en: He has tasted the bitters and sweets of life.
zh: 他尝遍了人生的酸甜苦辣。

en: He has a firm purpose in life.
He drifted aimlessly through life.
zh: 他漫无目的地度过一生。

en: He has no definite object in life.
zh: 他没有明确的人生目标。

en: He has only one aim in life, to make money.
zh: 他一生只有一个目标，就是赚钱。

en: He was glad to avail himself of any means to succeed in life.
zh: 他很高兴利用任何手段来获得成功。

en: He tried to awake people from their ignorance.
zh: 他试图唤醒人们摆脱无知。

en: He liberated the people from bondage.
zh: 他把人民从奴役中解放了出来。

en: He knew little about the people.
He always stands off when people are enthusiastic.
zh: 当人们热情高涨时，他总是置身事外。

en: He is not a person who has strong racial prejudice.
zh: 他不是一个有强烈种族偏见的人。

en: He condemned racial discrimination as evil.
zh: 他谴责种族歧视是邪恶的。

en: He fought against racial discrimination.
He is not guilty of murder.
He made his way through the crowd.
He lost himself quickly in the crowd.
He elbowed his way through the crowd.
He disappeared in the crowd.
He lost sight of his friend in the crowd.
zh: 他在人群中失去了朋友的踪影。

en: He revived the child with artificial respiration.
zh: 他用人工呼吸使孩子苏醒。

en: He ordered them to survey population growth.
zh: 他命令他们调查人口增长情况。

en: He is shy of strangers.
He got four dolls, of which three were made in China.
zh: 他得到了四个娃娃，其中三个是中国制造的。

en: He has a deep insight into human psychology.
zh: 他对人类心理学有深刻的洞察力。

en: He is a devil in human shape.
He is a man of character.
He was devoid of human feeling.
He had established a solid reputation as a man of character.
zh: 他已经树立了作为一个有品格的人的良好声誉。

en: He leads you by the nose if you let him.
zh: 如果你让他牵着鼻子走，他就会这么做。

en: He has an eye for people.
He finds pleasure in watching people.
He is eager to please.
He is poor at listening to a person's story.
zh: 他不擅长听别人讲故事。

en: He has a habit of moving his head up and down when he is listening to a conversation.
zh: 他有个习惯，听人说话的时候总是上下点头。

en: He is apt to forget people's names.
zh: 他很容易忘记别人的名字。

en: He is apt to forget people's name.
zh: 他很容易忘记别人的名字。

en: He defends suicide on the grounds that one's self-dignity is more important.
zh: 他为自杀辩护，理由是人的尊严更重要。

en: Because he believes in the importance of people's own dignity, he advocates suicide.
zh: 因为他相信人的尊严的重要性，所以他提倡自杀。

en: He tried not to hurt others' feelings.
zh: 他尽量不伤害别人的感情。

en: He is fond of gossip.
He loves to gossip.
He is not such a mean fellow as will speak against other people.
zh: 他不是那种会在背后说人坏话的卑鄙小人。

en: He is always finding fault with others.
He is just to a person.
He's got a commanding manner about him.
He deals fairly with people.
He is not such a stingy man as he is made out to be.
zh: 他不像人们说的那样吝啬。

en: He cut a fine figure in company.
He has a friendly nature.
She glimpsed him running through the crowd.
He had his pocket picked in the crowd.
zh: 他在人群中被扒了口袋。

en: He seems nice, but he's wicked at heart.
zh: 他看起来很好，但内心很邪恶。

en: He is kind of person no one would turn to for help.
zh: 他不是那种会让人求助的人。

en: He hurt his finger with a needle.
He tends to get angry when people oppose him.
zh: 当别人反对他时，他容易生气。

en: He readily agreed to my proposal.
zh: 他欣然同意了我的提议。

en: He was willing to care for that cat.
He has learned to be patient.
He was patient.
He barely escaped death.
He lived a hard life.
He lives within his means.
He is a man of high social status.
zh: 他是个社会地位很高的人。

en: He is a man of position.
How tall is he?
He is five feet tall.
He felt himself lifted up.
zh: 他感觉自己被抬了起来。

en: He felt himself being lifted up.
zh: 他感觉自己正在被抬起来。

en: He felt himself seized by a strong arm from behind.
zh: 他感觉自己被身后一只强有力的手臂抓住了。

en: He began to study with a will.
He didn't reveal his identity.
zh: 他没有透露自己的身份。

en: He motioned us away.
He bent over and said "I'm not lying".
zh: 他弯下腰说：“我没有撒谎”。

en: His hair stood on end.
He wept over his misfortunes.
zh: 他为自己的不幸而哭泣。

en: He lamented his hard fate.
He is aware of his danger.
zh: 他意识到自己身处险境。

en: He is well dressed, but he is anything but a gentleman.
zh: 他衣冠楚楚，但绝不是个绅士。

en: He disagrees with his relatives.
He grieved at the death of his best friend.
zh: 他为他最好的朋友的去世而悲伤。

en: He succeeded to his father's business.
zh: 他继承了他父亲的生意。

en: He's a carbon copy of his father.
He did it out of kindness.
zh: 他出于好意才这么做的。

en: He seems to be friendly.
He was kind enough to take me to the hospital.
zh: 他很友善，带我去了医院。

en: He has a hunger for kindness after fame.
zh: 成名之后，他渴望得到别人的善意。

en: He was kind enough to show me the post office.
zh: 他很友善，给我指了去邮局的路。

en: He was kind enough to help me with my studies.
He was kind enough to show me the way.
He had the kindness to show me the way.
He was so kind as to give the old man his seat.
zh: 他很友善，把座位让给了那位老人。

en: He was kind enough to take us over to the island in his boat.
zh: 他很友善，用他的船把我们带到了岛上。

en: He had the kindness to take me to the hospital.
He was kind enough to help me.
He had the kindness to help me.
He was so kind as to see me home.
He was kind enough to take me to the bus stop.
zh: 他很友善，送我去了公交车站。

en: He was very kind to invite me to his birthday party.
zh: 他非常友善，邀请我参加他的生日聚会。

en: He was kind enough to help me with my homework.
He had the kindness to help me with my work.
zh: 他好心帮我完成了工作。

en: He was kind enough to tie my shoelaces.
He had the kindness to supply me with my school expenses.
He was kind enough to give me something cold to drink.
zh: 他很友善，给我喝了些冰镇的饮料。

en: He was so kind as to show me around the town.
zh: 他很友善，带我参观了这座城镇。

en: He was so kind as to offer his seat to me.
zh: 他很友善，把座位让给了我。

en: He was kind enough to show me the way to the library.
zh: 他很友善，给我指了去图书馆的路。

en: He had the kindness to find me a job.
zh: 他好心帮我找了份工作。

en: He was kind enough to lend me money.
He was kind enough to show me the way to the station.
zh: 他很热心地给我指了去车站的路。

en: He was so kind as to show me the way to the station.
zh: 他很热心地给我指了去车站的路。

en: He was kind enough to lend me some money.
zh: 他很热心地借给我一些钱。

en: He was so kind as to help us.
zh: 他很热心地帮助了我们。

en: He was so kind as to lend us some money.
zh: 他很热心地借给我们一些钱。

en: He was kind enough to see that I wanted for nothing.
zh: 他很热心地确保我什么都不缺。

en: He had the kindness to show me the way to the theater.
zh: 他好心地给我指了去剧院的路。

en: He was kind enough to invite me.
He had the goodness to come all the way to see me.
zh: 他好心地大老远来看我。

en: He was a very kind man, but his verbosity was exasperating.
zh: 他是个非常好的人，但他太爱说话了，真让人受不了。

en: He had a kind manner.
He seems a kind man.
He seems to be a kind person.
I found that he was a kind man.
He is a kind boy.
People like him because he is kind.
zh: 人们喜欢他因为他很善良。

en: He was kind enough to tell me the truth.
zh: 他很热心地告诉我真相。

en: He is more gentle than kind.
zh: 他与其说是善良，不如说是温柔。

en: He is kind and gentle, and what is better still, honest.
zh: 他既善良又温柔，而且更好的是，他还诚实。

en: He is a kind and nice fellow.
zh: 他是个善良又友善的人。

en: He is kind, and, what is still better, very honest.
zh: 他很善良，而且更好的是，非常诚实。

en: He is kindness itself.
zh: 他简直就是善良的化身。

en: He looks very kind, but he is unpleasant.
zh: 他看起来很善良，但实际上让人不愉快。

en: He seems kind.
He is staying with his relatives.
He built on his father's fortune.
zh: 他靠着他父亲的财富发家致富。

en: He picked up a butterfly between his thumb and forefinger.
zh: 他用拇指和食指夹起一只蝴蝶。

en: He became a singer against his parents wishes.
zh: 他不顾父母的意愿成为了一名歌手。

en: He is no gentleman.
He was born and bred a gentleman.
He is far from being a gentleman.
He is a gentleman.
He's a gentleman.
He is a gentleman and ought to be treated as such.
zh: 他是个绅士，应该受到这样的待遇。

en: He is a gentleman. He cannot have said such a thing.
zh: 他是个绅士。他不可能说过这样的话。

en: He went as far as Kobe by train.
zh: 他坐火车最远到了神户。

en: He suffered a nervous breakdown.
He worked under divine guidance.
He doesn't believe in God.
He showed great reverence towards the pictures of the god.
zh: 他对神的画像表现出极大的敬意。

en: He prayed to God to help the poor girl.
zh: 他祈求上帝帮助那个可怜的女孩。

en: He did not return home till midnight.
He is of a serious turn of mind.
He gave me a ring at midnight.
zh: 午夜时分，他给了我一枚戒指。

en: He could not rest until he knew the truth.
zh: 在知道真相之前，他无法安心。

en: He stopped looking for the pearl.
He told the truth.
He said the truth.
It seems that he knows the truth.
He seems to have known the truth.
zh: 他似乎已经知道真相了。

en: He believed in the truth.
He spoke truth.
It occurred to me that he might not tell the truth.
zh: 我突然想到他可能没说实话。

en: He keeps a straight face while telling a ridiculous story.
zh: 他讲着荒谬的故事，却面不改色。

en: He came straight up to me.
He had his car stolen in broad daylight.
zh: 他的车在光天化日之下被偷了。

en: He fell head over heels into the pool.
zh: 他头朝下栽进了游泳池。

en: He is gifted with perfect wisdom.
zh: 他天赋异禀，拥有完美的智慧。

en: He working all right.
He declined the offer and so did I.
zh: 他拒绝了那个提议，我也是。

en: He deemed it wise to accept the offer.
zh: 他认为接受这个提议是明智的。

en: He thought it would be wise to accept the offer.
zh: 他认为接受这个提议是明智的。

en: He accepted our offer.
He was deceived by the late night television shopping network and paid high prices.
zh: 他被深夜电视购物网络欺骗，付了高价。

en: He bent his head low.
He was cured of his heavy drinking.
Besides those serious problems, he had to contend with all sorts of people.
zh: 除了那些严重的问题，他还得应付各种各样的人。

en: He breathed deeply.
He took a deep breath.
He could not breathe deeply.
He is a man with profound learning.
zh: 他是一个学识渊博的人。

en: He was absorbed in deep thought.
Deeply moved, he tried to express his thanks.
zh: 他深受感动，试图表达他的感谢。

en: Being deeply thankful, he tried to express his thanks.
zh: 他非常感激，试图表达他的感谢。

en: He fell into a deep sleep.
He is a man of profound knowledge.
He gave a deep sigh.
He passed through the woods.
He went hunting in the woods.
He got lost in the course of walking in the woods.
zh: 他在树林里行走时迷路了。

en: He got lost while he was walking in the woods.
zh: 他在树林里行走时迷路了。

en: He got lost while walking in the woods.
zh: 他在树林里行走时迷路了。

en: He lost his way in the woods.
He walked in the forest, with birds singing cheerfully above his head.
zh: 他在森林里行走，头顶上方鸟儿欢快地歌唱。

en: He ran away in the direction of the wood.
zh: 他朝树林的方向跑走了。

en: He delivers newspapers.
He was reading a newspaper.
He stopped reading the newspaper.
He stopped reading newspapers.
He makes it a rule to go over the financial section every time he reads the paper.
zh: 他每次看报纸都一定会浏览财经版。

en: He likes to read newspapers.
He picked up the newspaper and glanced casually over the front page.
zh: 他拿起报纸，随意地浏览了一下头版。

en: He sent his son out to get the newspaper.
zh: 他让他的儿子出去拿报纸。

en: He was reading a paper upside down.
He peered at the small print in a newspaper.
zh: 他仔细地看报纸上的小字。

en: He answered an advertisement in the paper and got the job.
zh: 他看到报纸上的招聘广告，然后去应聘并得到了这份工作。

en: He wanted to publish his photographs in the newspapers.
zh: 他想在报纸上发表他的照片。

en: He ran an ad in the paper.
He wanted to be in the newspapers.
He cut the advertisement out of the newspaper.
zh: 他从报纸上剪下了那则广告。

en: He purposed writing something for the paper.
zh: 他打算为报纸写点东西。

en: He thought that he would write something for the newspaper.
zh: 他想他会为报纸写点东西。

en: He insured his new house against fire.
zh: 他给他的新房子买了火灾保险。

en: He is engaged in developing new materials.
zh: 他正在从事新材料的开发。

en: He opened the window to let in some fresh air.
zh: 他打开窗户，让新鲜空气进来。

en: He went outside for a breath of fresh air.
He started a new life.
He showed a lot of enthusiasm for the development of new products.
zh: 他对新产品的开发表现出极大的热情。

en: He made a killing in his new business.
zh: 他在新生意中大赚了一笔。

en: He made a lot of money in his new business.
zh: 他在新生意中赚了很多钱。

en: He lost his way in Shinjuku Station.
He bought a new car.
He bought a new car. He had had his old one for more than ten years.
zh: 他买了一辆新车。他的旧车已经开了十多年了。

en: He advanced a new plan.
zh: 他提出了一个新的计划。

en: He went to America for the purpose of learning a new method of producing crops.
zh: 他去美国是为了学习一种新的农作物生产方法。

en: He demonstrated new vacuum cleaners.
zh: 他演示了新的真空吸尘器。

en: He claimed that he had discovered a new comet.
zh: 他声称他发现了一颗新的彗星。

en: He risked his whole fortune to discover new oil fields.
zh: 他冒着全部财产的风险去发现新的油田。

en: He has begun on a new book.
zh: 他已经开始写一本新书了。

en: He had a new suit made.
He worked out a new formula.
zh: 他研究出了一种新的公式。

en: He engaged a new secretary.
He hired a new secretary.
He used a wire to connect the new light.
He is wild to buy a new motorcycle.
zh: 他非常想买一辆新摩托车。

en: He really wants to buy a new motorcycle.
zh: 他真的很想买一辆新摩托车。

en: He gave us an explanation about the new billing system.
zh: 他向我们解释了新的账单系统。

en: He has the problem of adapting to a new way of life.
zh: 他有适应新生活方式的问题。

en: He got accustomed to the new way of living.
zh: 他已经习惯了新的生活方式。

en: He adapted himself to his new life.
zh: 他使自己适应了他的新生活。

en: He discovered a new star.
zh: 他发现了一颗新的星星。

en: He had decided on a new policy.
zh: 他已经决定了一项新的政策。

en: He is seeking a new position.
zh: 他正在寻找一份新的职位。

en: I hope he will make good in his new position.
zh: 我希望他能在新的职位上取得成功。

en: He worked very hard to raise his family in the new place.
zh: 他非常努力地在新地方养家糊口。

en: He is engaged upon a new novel.
zh: 他正在创作一部新的小说。

en: He is working on a new novel.
zh: 他正在写一部新的小说。

en: He has set up a new business.
zh: 他已经建立了一家新的公司。

en: He bought a new pair of gloves.
He wants a new car.
He has bought a new car.
He has a new car and an old car.
zh: 他有一辆新车和一辆旧车。

en: He is pleased with his new car.
He wants to get a new dictionary.
He is so crazy about his new car that he goes driving every Sunday.
zh: 他太喜欢他的新车了，以至于每个星期天都去兜风。

en: He was eager to show off his new bicycle to his friends.
zh: 他急于向他的朋友们炫耀他的新自行车。

en: He is going to buy a new bicycle.
zh: 他打算买一辆新自行车。

en: He plans to buy a new bicycle.
zh: 他计划买一辆新自行车。

en: He intends to buy a new bicycle.
zh: 他打算买一辆新自行车。

en: He was eager to display his new bicycle to his friends.
zh: 他急于向他的朋友们展示他的新自行车。

en: He showed off his new watch.
He needed capital to start a new business.
zh: 他需要资金来开始一项新的生意。

en: He embarked on a new enterprise.
zh: 他开始了一项新的事业。

en: He absorbed new ideas.
He went to Tokyo for the purpose of getting a new job.
zh: 他去东京是为了找一份新工作。

en: He was in a hurry to begin the new job.
He's thrilled with his new job.
zh: 他对他的新工作感到非常兴奋。

en: I'm sure he will make good in the new job.
zh: 我相信他会在新的工作上取得成功。

en: He will surely succeed in his new job.
zh: 他肯定会在他的新工作上取得成功。

en: He didn't get on well in his new job.
zh: 他在新的工作上进展不顺利。

en: It seems that he is happy with his new job.
zh: 看来他对他的新工作很满意。

en: He embarked on a new study.
zh: 他开始了一项新的研究。

en: He thought up a new idea.
He intends to bring out a new monthly magazine.
zh: 他打算出版一本新的月刊。

en: He lost himself in his new research.
zh: 他沉浸在他的新研究中。

en: He is working on the new plan.
He engages himself in every new project.
zh: 他全身心投入到每一个新项目中。

en: He tried putting on his new shoes.
He bought a new pair of shoes.
He is pleased with his new shoes.
He operated the new machine.
He couldn't adapt to new circumstances.
He tried to adapt himself to his new surroundings.
He is quick to adapt to new circumstances.
zh: 他很快就能适应新的环境。

en: He quickly accustomed himself to his new surroundings.
zh: 他很快就适应了新的环境。

en: He borrowed money from the bank to finance his home.
zh: 他向银行贷款来支付他的房子。

en: He built a new house.
He not only made the plan of a new house but built it himself.
zh: 他不仅制定了新房子的计划，而且自己建造了它。

en: He recently traded in his jeep for a new Mercedes.
zh: 他最近把他的吉普车换成了一辆新的奔驰。

en: He's getting on well in his new business.
He's always playing up to the boss, in hopes of getting a new PC in his office.
zh: 他总是奉承老板，希望能在办公室里得到一台新电脑。

en: I heard that he bought a new computer.
zh: 我听说他买了一台新电脑。

en: He employed a new maid.
He is full of new ideas.
He manifested his character in his behavior.
zh: 他的行为体现了他的性格。

en: He is very peculiar in his behavior.
He looked back and smiled at me.
He turned around and looked back.
He is a careful worker.
He is a careful player.
He performed his duty with deliberation.
zh: 他深思熟虑地履行了他的职责。

en: He has a doctor's degree in psychology.
zh: 他拥有心理学博士学位。

en: He sat brooding over his troubles all day.
zh: 他整天闷闷不乐地想着他的烦恼。

en: His anxiety was such that he could hardly sleep.
zh: 他的焦虑让他几乎无法入睡。

en: He is a good man at heart.
He died of a heart attack.
He is the foremost authority on heart surgery.
zh: 他是心脏外科方面的权威。

en: He has a bad heart.
He is sound in both mind and body.
He felt his heart beating fast.
zh: 他感到他的心脏跳得很快。

en: He steeled himself against compassion.
zh: 他狠下心肠，不让自己动恻隐之心。

en: He read to his heart's content.
He enjoyed the vacation to his heart's content.
zh: 他尽情地享受了这次假期。

en: He sang to his heart's content.
His presence of mind deserted him.
He is kind at heart.
He welcomed the news from his heart.
zh: 他由衷地欢迎这个消息。

en: He laughed a hearty laugh.
He turned over the matter in his mind.
zh: 他在心里反复思考这件事。

en: He thought to himself, "No!" Aloud he said, "Yes."
zh: 他心想：“不！” 嘴上却说：“是的。”

en: He learned the poem by heart.
He could do nothing but give up his plan against his will.
zh: 他只能违心地放弃他的计划。

en: He'd better watch out, or Mulligan is going to wipe the floor with him.
zh: 他最好小心点，不然穆里根会把他打得落花流水。

en: He is looked up to for his breadth of mind.
zh: 他因其思想的广阔而受人尊敬。

en: He greeted her with cordiality.
He came downstairs out of the bedroom for breakfast.
He rolled over in his sleep.
He turned over in bed.
He overslept himself.
He makes a point of doing ten push-ups before going to bed.
zh: 他坚持在睡前做十个俯卧撑。

en: He took a look at the newspaper before going to bed.
He glanced over the newspaper before turning in.
zh: 他睡前浏览了一下报纸。

en: He drank plenty of black coffee so as not to fall asleep.
zh: 他喝了很多黑咖啡，以免睡着。

en: He had to stay in bed.
Is he sleeping?
He went to bed.
He sat up all night reading a novel.
zh: 他熬夜看了一晚上小说。

en: He stayed up all night reading a novel.
zh: 他熬夜看了一晚上小说。

en: He sat up all night.
He stayed up all night.
He is a man whom we can trust.
zh: 他是一个我们可以信任的人。

en: He's a man we can trust.
zh: 他是个我们可以信任的人。

en: He was respected as a hero because he defended his country against the invaders.
zh: 他被尊为英雄，因为他保卫国家抵抗侵略者。

en: He is not a man to rely on.
zh: 他不是一个可以依靠的人。

en: I believe that he is a reliable man.
zh: 我相信他是一个可靠的人。

en: He is a reliable person and has a strong sense of responsibility.
zh: 他是一个可靠的人，并且有很强的责任感。

en: He has a good name for reliability.
He is not a man to be trusted.
zh: 他不是一个可以信任的人。

en: He can be trusted.
He can be relied on.
You can count on him.
He can be counted on.
He lost his honor.
He is a man to be trusted.
zh: 他是一个值得信任的人。

en: He cannot be trusted.
He can't be trusted.
He is a man of faith.
He is a man of strong faith.
zh: 他是一个有坚定信仰的人。

en: He turned his tail and ran.
He is lazy.
He's lazy.
He has a good appetite.
He has a large store of food.
He asked for food.
He sat at the head of the table.
He found a job with a food company.
zh: 他在一家食品公司找到了一份工作。

en: He was always on the people's side.
zh: 他总是站在人民的一边。

en: He studies day and night.
He always wears dark glasses.
He was always on the side of the weak against the strong.
zh: 他总是站在弱者一边反对强者。

en: He hit the ball out of bounds.
He entertained us with jokes all evening.
zh: 他整个晚上都用笑话逗我们开心。

en: He carried a joke too far.
He said so by way of a joke.
He said so only by way of a joke.
zh: 他只是开玩笑这么说的。

en: He did it just for fun.
zh: 他只是为了好玩才这么做的。

en: When he saw the joke, he laughed in spite of himself.
zh: 当他明白这个笑话时，他忍不住笑了出来。

en: He doesn't see a joke.
He was brought up to riding.
He laughed at my joke.
He is good at riding a horse.
He is on board ship.
He is said to have been strong.
He belongs to the upper class.
He is in favor with his superiors.
He is in disfavour with his superiors.
He was made to work all day by the boss.
zh: 他被老板逼着工作了一整天。

en: He was bare to the waist.
He hung his coat on a hook.
He had no coat on.
He took off his coat and put it on again.
He was reading a newspaper in his shirt sleeves.
zh: 他穿着衬衫袖子在看报纸。

en: He hung up his coat.
He took off his coat.
He noticed a hole in his jacket, but he tried to ignore it.
zh: 他注意到他的夹克衫上有一个洞，但他尽量不去理会。

en: He zipped up his jacket.
He took a key from his coat pocket.
zh: 他从外套口袋里拿出一把钥匙。

en: He burned a hole in his coat.
He speaks Japanese well, but I can't speak German.
zh: 他日语说得很好，但我不会说德语。

en: He speaks English well.
He can handle English well.
He can swim well.
He's good at swimming.
He handled the knife and fork very well.
He plays the guitar well.
He coaxed extra money from his mother.
zh: 他从他妈妈那里哄骗到额外的钱。

en: He planned to murder his boss, but did not carry it out.
zh: 他计划谋杀他的老板，但没有实施。

en: He cannot help accepting his boss's order.
zh: 他不得不接受老板的命令。

en: He gets along badly with his boss.
zh: 他和他的老板相处不好。

en: He is not well-liked by his boss.
He made believe not to hear his boss.
zh: 他假装没听见老板的话。

en: He pretended not to hear his boss.
zh: 他假装没听见老板的话。

en: He attended the meeting in place of his boss.
zh: 他代替他的老板参加了会议。

en: He breathed deeply before entering his boss's office.
zh: 他走进老板办公室前深吸了一口气。

en: He's in good odor with the chief.
He handed in his resignation to his boss.
He is always complaining about his boss.
He attempted to sidestep a conflict with his chief.
zh: 他试图回避与领导的冲突。

en: He knows better than to fight with his boss.
zh: 他很清楚和老板作对没什么好处。

en: He is in with the boss.
He has his superiors' confidence.
He pretends to be enthusiastic when his boss is around.
zh: 老板在场的时候，他假装很热情。

en: Whenever he comes up to Tokyo, he stays at our house.
zh: 每次他来东京，他都住在我们家。

en: Whenever he comes up to Tokyo, he stays with us.
zh: 每次他来东京，他都住在我们家。

en: Every time he comes up to Tokyo, he never fails to call me up.
zh: 每次他来东京，总会给我打电话。

en: He came up to Tokyo, and there married her.
zh: 他来到东京，然后和她结婚了。

en: He was in good spirits.
He was looking upward to the sky.
He deposited the prize money in the bank.
He boasted of having won the prize.
He didn't jump high enough to win a prize.
zh: 他跳得不够高，没能赢得奖品。

en: He carved designs in ivory.
He explained it in detail.
zh: 他详细地解释了这件事。

en: He gave no further detail.
zh: 他没有提供进一步的细节。

en: He was called to give evidence.
He was confronted with the evidence.
He cloaks his wickedness under a smiling face.
zh: 他把他的邪恶隐藏在笑容之下。

en: He was borne away by an impulse.
He greeted me with a smile.
He was afraid of being laughed at.
He tried to laugh her out of her foolish belief.
zh: 他试图用笑来让她放弃她那愚蠢的信念。

en: He laughed.
He does nothing but laugh.
It was all he could do not to laugh.
zh: 他竭力才忍住没笑出来。

en: All he could do was resist laughing.
zh: 他所能做的就是忍住不笑。

en: He was embarrassed.
He was made a fool of.
He played a hose on the burning hotel.
zh: 他用水管对着燃烧的旅馆喷水。

en: He made up his mind to be a fireman.
zh: 他下决心要当一名消防员。

en: He has a passive character.
He called up his uncle on reaching Matsuyama.
zh: 到达松山后，他给叔叔打了电话。

en: He called up his uncle as soon as he got to Matsuyama.
zh: 他一到松山就给叔叔打了电话。

en: He lived in Matsue for seven years.
He is angling for promotion.
He is out for promotion.
He is qualified for promotion.
He threw away his chance of promotion.
He is very reluctant to accept the invitation.
He withheld his consent.
He put his foot through the floor.
He looked down at the floor.
He was standing on the floor.
He lay at full length on the floor.
He dropped his books on the floor.
He fell down on the floor.
He collapsed on the floor.
He laid himself flat on the floor.
He was sitting on the floor.
As soon as he went to bed, he fell asleep.
He is confined to bed now.
He picked up a handkerchief from the floor.
zh: 他从地板上捡起一块手帕。

en: He put a touch of salt on a boiled egg.
zh: 他在煮鸡蛋上撒了一点盐。

en: He was naughty when a boy.
He was naughty when he was a boy.
He was very naughty in his boyhood.
He seized the boy by the arm.
zh: 他抓住那个男孩的手臂。

en: He was very naughty when he was a little boy.
He caught a boy stealing his watch.
zh: 他抓到一个男孩偷他的手表。

en: He is a bit on the heavy side.
He has a knowledge of English.
He's a bit of a drunkard.
He took a glance at the girl.
He bent over the girl and kissed her.
zh: 他弯腰亲吻了那个女孩。

en: He grouped the girls in three rows.
He washes his car at least once a week.
He pulls down at least twenty million yen a year.
zh: 他一年至少能挣两千万日元。

en: He reads ten books a month at least.
zh: 他一个月至少读十本书。

en: He has at least one thousand books.
He has no less than five English books.
He has not a little interest in music.
He gave me what little money he had about him.
zh: 他把他身上仅有的一点钱都给了我。

en: He is a bit like his father.
He looks a bit tired, doesn't he?
zh: 他看起来有点累，不是吗？

en: He looks a bit tired.
He seems to have a touch of fever.
He left a while ago.
He's somewhat hard of hearing, so please speak louder.
zh: 他有点耳背，所以请大声点说。

en: He arrived shortly after.
He continued his work after a short break.
zh: 他在短暂的休息后继续工作。

en: He said, "Let's take a short rest."
zh: 他说：“我们稍微休息一下吧。”

en: He suggested that we take a short rest.
zh: 他建议我们稍微休息一下。

en: He likes sports that have a touch of risk.
zh: 他喜欢带点风险的运动。

en: He drank a little.
He grew no fatter.
He shows no mark of progress.
zh: 他没有任何进步的迹象。

en: He made no manifestation of his disappointment.
zh: 他没有表现出任何失望。

en: He didn't do a stitch of work.
He didn't do any work.
He was not happy at all.
He is nothing of a scholar.
He is no kind of musician.
zh: 他根本不是什么音乐家。

en: He can't swim at all, but when it comes to skiing, he is the best.
zh: 他完全不会游泳，但说到滑雪，他是最棒的。

en: He is always on the move.
Is he anything of a scholar?
He spoke with a suggestion of sarcasm in his voice.
zh: 他说话的语气带着一丝讽刺。

en: Is he anything like handsome?
He made the soup by mixing a little meat with some rice.
zh: 他把少量肉和一些米混合在一起做了汤。

en: He will return if only a little.
zh: 只要稍微有点希望，他就会回来。

en: He dug the hole bit by bit.
zh: 他一点一点地挖了这个洞。

en: He has recovered little by little.
He recovered little by little.
He will get better little by little.
zh: 他会一点一点好起来的。

en: He is getting better bit by bit.
zh: 他一点一点地好起来了。

en: He saved money little by little, so that he could build a new house.
zh: 他一点一点地攒钱，以便盖一栋新房子。

en: He sent out the parcel the day before yesterday.
He has a small frame.
He aimed at the bird.
He didn't dare to jump the brook.
He is two years older than Ogawa.
He is a novelist and artist.
zh: 他是一位小说家和艺术家。

en: He won fame as a novelist.
zh: 他以小说家的身份赢得了名声。

en: He is known to us all as a novelist.
zh: 我们都知道他是一位小说家。

en: He is a critic rather than a novelist.
zh: 与其说他是一位小说家，不如说他是一位评论家。

en: I think he is not so much a novelist as he is a scholar.
zh: 我认为与其说他是一位小说家，不如说他是一位学者。

en: He is a novelist and poet.
zh: 他是一位小说家和诗人。

en: He sat down to read a novel.
He is writing a novel.
He prefers poetry to fiction.
He is now writing a sister volume to his novel.
zh: 他现在正在写他那部小说的姊妹篇。

en: He signed the check.
He tied the twigs into bundles.
He bound twigs in faggots.
He tied the small branches into a bundle.
He had an old pickup truck and a big, battered mower.
zh: 他有一辆旧皮卡和一辆破旧的大型割草机。

en: He took her cubs, and ran up the mountain without looking back.
zh: 他带走了她的幼崽，头也不回地跑上了山。

en: He is a primary school teacher, so he is used to dealing with children.
zh: 他是一名小学老师，所以他习惯于和孩子们打交道。

en: He is in fourth grade of elementary school.
He saved a little boy from drowning.
zh: 他救了一个溺水的小男孩。

en: He grew up in a little village.
He is sailing a little boat on the water.
zh: 他正在水上驾驶一艘小船。

en: He made a small dog house.
He keeps a small poultry yard.
zh: 他养了一个小型家禽场。

en: He was able to build a small house.
zh: 他能够建造一栋小房子。

en: He came across the Atlantic in a small sailboat.
zh: 他乘坐一艘小帆船横渡了大西洋。

en: He crossed the river in a small boat.
He is too young to go swimming alone.
zh: 他太小了，不能独自去游泳。

en: He has a large desk in his small room.
zh: 他的小房间里有一张大桌子。

en: He's adept at jumping into profitable niches.
zh: 他擅长进入有利可图的利基市场。

en: He was small, but strong.
He is a promising young businessman.
zh: 他是一位很有前途的年轻商人。

en: I think of him as a promising journalist.
zh: 我认为他是一个很有前途的记者。

en: He is a potential leader.
zh: 他是一个有潜力的领导者。

en: He wants to be a scientist in the future.
zh: 他将来想成为一名科学家。

en: He wants to be a doctor in the future.
zh: 他将来想成为一名医生。

en: He staked his future on this single chance.
zh: 他把自己的未来押在了这唯一的机会上。

en: He will be a Shakespeare in the future.
zh: 他将来会成为像莎士比亚一样伟大的人。

en: He wants to become a cook in the future.
zh: 他将来想成为一名厨师。

en: He wants to be an Edison in the future.
zh: 他将来想成为像爱迪生一样伟大的人。

en: He'll have many hardships to go through in the future.
zh: 他将来会经历很多困难。

en: He wants to be a policeman in the future.
zh: 他将来想成为一名警察。

en: He hopes to run a company in the future.
zh: 他希望将来能经营一家公司。

en: He will be a Newton in the future.
zh: 他将来会成为像牛顿一样伟大的人。

en: He is likely to win the scholarship.
He studied on a scholarship.
He studied hard with a view to gaining a scholarship.
zh: 他努力学习，目的是获得奖学金。

en: He traveled on business.
He went to Tokyo on business.
He is absent on business in Osaka.
zh: 他因在大阪出差而缺席。

en: He's not here because he's on a business trip to Osaka.
zh: 他不在，因为他去大阪出差了。

en: He's out of the office because he's in Osaka on business.
zh: 他不在办公室，因为他在大阪出差。

en: Business carried him to Kobe.
He came up to Tokyo on business.
zh: 他为了工作来到了东京。

en: He went there on business.
He often goes abroad on business.
He went to New York on business.
He set up in business.
He is planning to develop his business.
He wants to engage in business.
He sold his business and retired.
He is the last person to succeed in business.
zh: 他是最后一个在商业上获得成功的人。

en: He is still green in business.
He has experience in business.
He made good in business.
zh: 他在生意上取得了成功。

en: His failure in business compelled him to sell his house.
zh: 他在生意上的失败迫使他卖掉了房子。

en: Business absorbs all his time.
zh: 生意占据了他所有的时间。

en: His business has come to a standstill.
He employed dishonest means in his business.
zh: 他在生意上使用了不正当的手段。

en: He could not make it in business.
He is not aggressive enough to succeed in business.
zh: 他不够有魄力，难以在生意上取得成功。

en: He rejoiced at the successful business transaction.
zh: 他为成功的商业交易感到高兴。

en: He is able in business.
He is in business.
He is rich enough to keep a servant.
zh: 他很富有，足以雇佣一个仆人。

en: He bragged of having won the victory.
zh: 他吹嘘自己赢得了胜利。

en: He burned for his moment of triumph.
zh: 他渴望着他胜利的时刻。

en: It looks like he will win.
He voiced his opinion with reckless abandon.
zh: 他肆无忌惮地表达了他的意见。

en: He flatters himself he will win.
If he wins he will gain self-confidence.
zh: 如果他赢了，他会获得自信。

en: He hopes he'll win and I hope so too.
zh: 他希望他能赢，我也希望如此。

en: Do you doubt that he will win?
He said he would win and he did, too.
zh: 他说他会赢，而且他也真的赢了。

en: He is sure of winning.
He had his wounds dressed.
He made believe not to be hurt.
He pretended not to be hurt.
He gradually recovered his temper.
He gradually came to love his father.
zh: 他渐渐地开始爱他的父亲。

en: He is getting used to this rural life by degrees.
zh: 他逐渐习惯了这种乡村生活。

en: He married an actress.
He is a hen-pecked husband.
He looks down on women.
He's the kind of guy who doesn't take women seriously.
zh: 他就是那种不把女人当回事的人。

en: He doesn't approve of women smoking.
He is only too pleased to be advised by a woman.
zh: 他非常乐意接受一位女士的建议。

en: He disguised himself as a woman.
He had a gentleness that was attractive to women.
zh: 他有一种吸引女性的温柔。

en: He is a woman hater.
He teaches in a girls' high school.
zh: 他在一所女子高中教书。

en: He had a prejudice against women drivers.
He bowed to the Queen.
He was given three ships by the queen.
He has no eye for women.
He watched the girls playing tennis.
He's just showing off in front of the girls.
zh: 他只是在女孩们面前炫耀。

en: He's always chasing girls.
He rescued a girl from drowning and was given a reward.
zh: 他救了一个溺水的女孩，并得到了奖励。

en: Women didn't care for him.
He placed great belief in his assistant.
He trusts his assistant quite a lot.
He can look to his uncle for advice.
zh: 他可以向他的叔叔寻求建议。

en: He has no friends to advise him.
zh: 他没有朋友可以给他建议。

en: He gave me not only advice but also money.
zh: 他不仅给了我建议，还给了我钱。

en: He called for help.
He heard a cry for help.
He cried out for help in a loud voice.
He asked for help.
He requested help.
He has only to ask for help.
He didn't come to help, but to hinder us.
zh: 他不是来帮忙的，而是来阻碍我们的。

en: He gave a loud cry for help.
He shouted for help.
He yelled for help.
He deposited his papers with his lawyer.
zh: 他把文件寄存在他的律师那里。

en: He read the document aloud.
He folded his paper, consulting his watch.
zh: 他折叠起纸，看了看手表。

en: He dumped the papers back into the drawer.
He took a glance at the papers.
He finished sorting the papers.
He didn't even look over the papers.
zh: 他甚至都没看一眼文件。

en: He was forced to sign the document.
He showed little interest in books or music.
zh: 他对书籍或音乐没什么兴趣。

en: He told the bookstore keeper that he would come there again to buy the book that afternoon.
zh: 他告诉书店老板，他下午会再去买那本书。

en: He bought a number of books at the bookstore.
He closeted himself in his study.
He is in his library.
He can't even read, let alone write.
zh: 他甚至不会读，更不用说写了。

en: He earns his bread as a writer.
He makes a living as a writer.
He earns his living by writing.
When he writes, he always keeps a dictionary at hand.
zh: 他写作时，总是手边放着一本字典。

en: He went around the neighborhood collecting signatures.
zh: 他在附近四处走动，收集签名。

en: He had no appetite because of the heat.
zh: 因为天气热，他没有胃口。

en: He was affected by the heat.
He fainted from the heat, but his wife's patient nursing brought him to.
zh: 他因中暑晕倒了，但他妻子耐心的照料使他恢复了过来。

en: Although he is elderly, he looks young.
zh: 虽然他年纪大了，但他看起来很年轻。

en: His maiden work established his reputation.
zh: 他的处女作奠定了他的声誉。

en: He made his mark as a writer with his very first novel.
zh: 他凭借他的第一部小说，作为一名作家而声名鹊起。

en: He is on a roll.
He has played his card out of turn.
He will graduate from university in 2001 if things go well.
zh: 如果一切顺利，他将于2001年从大学毕业。

en: He rose to the rank of sergeant.
He's a genuine aristocrat.
He failed in the examination for lack of preparation.
zh: 他因为缺乏准备而考试不及格。

en: He attached great importance to the event.
He tried to keep dry as best he could.
He tried his best not to get wet.
He played the game as best he could.
He has powerful connections in the publishing industry.
zh: 他在出版界有很硬的关系。

en: He is in the publishing business.
He has postponed his departure until tomorrow.
zh: 他把出发推迟到了明天。

en: He put off his departure till Sunday.
zh: 他把出发推迟到了星期天。

en: He suggested that we should put off our departure.
zh: 他建议我们应该推迟出发。

en: He decided he would put off his departure.
He decided to put off his departure.
He decided to postpone his departure.
He advanced his departure by two days.
He got ready for departure.
He was about to start.
He was laughed at by all the people present.
He was absent at roll call.
His attendance is irregular.
He said under oath that he was born in Italy.
zh: 他发誓说他出生在意大利。

en: He said under oath that his birthplace was Italy.
zh: 他发誓说他的出生地是意大利。

en: He wants to advance in the world.
zh: 他想在社会上有所作为。

en: His career culminated in the presidency.
zh: 他的事业以当上总统而达到顶峰。

en: He doesn't seem to want to get ahead.
He flirts with every woman he meets.
zh: 他跟每个遇到的女人都调情。

en: He shouted, "Get out!"
He did not go out, but sat down.
zh: 他没有出去，而是坐了下来。

en: All of a sudden, he proposed to me.
He stayed at home all day instead of going out.
zh: 他整天待在家里，没有出去。

en: He was welcomed wherever he went.
zh: 他无论走到哪里都受欢迎。

en: He is a proficient pianist.
zh: 他是一位熟练的钢琴家。

en: He enjoys a good reputation as a specialist in brain surgery.
zh: 他作为脑外科专家享有盛誉。

en: He is an adept climber.
zh: 他是一位熟练的登山者。

en: He studies at a cram school.
He leaves his homework half-finished.
It took him two hours to finish his homework.
zh: 他花了两个小时才完成作业。

en: After he had finished his homework, he went out for a walk.
zh: 他做完作业后，出去散步了。

en: He must finish his homework today.
He was busy with his homework.
He overlooked his assignment.
He stayed at his aunt's house.
He will visit his uncle.
He is named Jim after his uncle.
zh: 他以他叔叔的名字命名为吉姆。

en: He was put through university with money left by his uncle.
zh: 他靠叔叔留下的钱读完了大学。

en: He succeeded to his uncle's fortune.
zh: 他继承了他叔叔的财产。

en: He's staying with his uncle.
He laid down the gun.
He'll have to do without a gun.
He is framed for hard work.
He is accustomed to working hard.
He is accustomed to hard work.
He is a person of importance.
He played an important part.
He made an important scientific discovery.
zh: 他做出了重要的科学发现。

en: He picked out some important idioms.
zh: 他挑出了一些重要的习语。

en: He is suffering from a serious illness.
He is seriously ill and unlikely to recover.
zh: 他病得很重，不太可能康复。

en: They say that he is seriously ill.
He was very sick but his health is improving.
zh: 他病得很重，但他的健康状况正在改善。

en: He committed a serious crime.
He made an important discovery.
zh: 他有了一个重要的发现。

en: He was given an important mission.
zh: 他被赋予了一项重要的任务。

en: He made a grave mistake.
zh: 他犯了一个严重的错误。

en: He has made a significant decision.
zh: 他做出了一个重要的决定。

en: He was relieved of his heavy responsibility.
Though seriously injured, he managed to get to a telephone.
zh: 虽然身受重伤，但他还是设法找到了电话。

en: He was seriously ill, and the doctor was sent for.
zh: 他病得很重，所以请了医生。

en: He panted under a heavy load.
He could not come because of his serious illness.
He mentioned to me that he would go shopping in Shibuya.
zh: 他跟我提到他要去涩谷购物。

en: He made a little statue out of soft clay.
zh: 他用软泥做了一个小雕像。

en: He departed from the old custom.
He dismissed most of his men.
zh: 他解雇了他的大部分人。

en: He fired most of his men.
zh: 他解雇了他的大部分人。

en: He treats his employees well.
He is inaccessible to his employees.
He is well able to read.
He can read well.
He can read pretty well.
He can read well enough.
He refused my offer for no good reason.
zh: 他无缘无故地拒绝了我的提议。

en: He does not study hard enough.
He will be back in ten minutes.
He'll be back in ten.
He is well able to pay the charge.
zh: 他完全有能力支付这笔费用。

en: He's quite able at his job.
He has been dead for ten years.
He has been living in the cabin by himself for more than ten years.
zh: 他独自一人住在小屋里已经超过十年了。

en: I saw him after ten years.
He will come nine cases out of ten.
He's likely to come.
He's very likely to come.
There's a good chance that he'll come.
He's more than likely to come.
It's quite likely that he'll come.
He is late for meetings nine times out of ten.
zh: 他十次会议有九次迟到。

en: He left high school at seventeen.
He came at seven minutes after ten.
He crossed himself.
He told me his address, but unfortunately I had no paper to write it down on.
zh: 他告诉了我他的地址，但不幸的是我没有纸写下来。

en: He changed his address.
He had no house to live in.
He's looking for a place to live.
He lives in a little cozy house.
zh: 他住在一个舒适的小房子里。

en: He lives in a cozy little house.
zh: 他住在一个舒适的小房子里。

en: He had to address the meeting.
He took adequate clothes for a weekend trip.
zh: 他带了足够的衣服去度周末。

en: He asked me to keep him company on the weekends.
He is going to stay with his uncle for the weekend.
zh: 他周末要和他叔叔住在一起。

en: He often stays away from home on the weekend.
He plays golf on weekends.
He is paid by the week.
He goes to a tutorial school three days a week.
zh: 他一周去三次补习学校。

en: He works few days a week, and gets little money.
zh: 他一周工作几天，挣的钱很少。

en: He works beyond office hours twice a week.
He works a few days a week, and gets a little money.
zh: 他一周工作几天，挣的钱很少。

en: He writes me once a week.
He wrestled his attacker to the ground.
He is conservative in his habits.
He may have missed the last train.
zh: 他可能错过了最后一班火车。

en: He was released from prison immediately after the war.
zh: 战争结束后，他立即被释放出狱。

en: He ended by quoting the Bible.
He was the last but two to arrive.
zh: 他是倒数第三个到达的。

en: All having been spent on repairs, he applied to the bank for the loan.
zh: 因为所有的钱都花在修理上了，他向银行申请了贷款。

en: Before retiring he usually dumps the chicken feed from all his pockets onto the table.
zh: 退休前，他通常会把他口袋里所有的鸡饲料都倒在桌子上。

en: Before going to bed, he usually takes all the coins from his pockets and dumps them on the table.
zh: 睡觉前，他通常会把他口袋里所有的硬币都倒在桌子上。

en: He declined the job-offer very politely.
zh: 他很有礼貌地拒绝了这份工作邀请。

en: He grabbed the chance to get a job.
zh: 他抓住了得到工作的机会。

en: He's old enough to go to school.
He has no religious mind.
He is interested in anything that has to do with religion.
zh: 他对任何与宗教有关的事情都感兴趣。

en: He is too much superior to those about him to be quickly understood.
zh: 他太优秀了，以至于周围的人很难理解他。

en: He looked around.
He lives beyond his income.
He tried to make both ends meet.
He lives up to his income.
He was asleep during the lesson.
He was caught reading a comic book in class.
zh: 他上课时被抓到看漫画书。

en: He had his head in the clouds in class.
zh: 他上课时总是心不在焉。

en: He is always taking a nap at school.
He absented himself from classes.
He wanted to absent himself from the class.
He lingered in the classroom after school was over.
zh: 放学后，他在教室里逗留。

en: He did not enjoy his lessons.
He took up the receiver and dialed.
He picked up the phone.
He put the phone down.
He is not qualified to take the examination.
zh: 他不具备参加考试的资格。

en: He succeeded in entering the university.
He succeeded in swimming across the river.
He committed suicide by hanging himself.
He was forced to resign as prime minister.
He had an interview with the Prime Minister.
He shook his head back and forth.
He shook his head up and down.
He shook his head.
He hanged himself.
He was driving under the influence of alcohol.
He was given to drinking and ruined his health.
zh: 他嗜酒成性，毁掉了自己的健康。

en: He is old enough to drink.
zh: 他到了可以喝酒的年龄了。

en: He gets a little bold after he's had a few drinks.
zh: 他喝了几杯后就有点放肆了。

en: He never drinks without complaining about his son.
zh: 他每次喝酒都要抱怨他的儿子。

en: He drinks to excess.
He drinks too much alcohol.
He ruined his body by drinking too much.
zh: 他因酗酒而毁了自己的身体。

en: He restricted his drinking to one beer a day.
zh: 他限制自己每天只喝一瓶啤酒。

en: He refrained from drinking too much.
zh: 他克制自己，不喝太多酒。

en: He is drunk.
He is given to drink.
He's giving himself up to drink.
Drinking was his ruin.
He has nothing in common with her as to their tastes.
zh: 在品味方面，他和她没有任何共同之处。

en: He has elegant tastes.
He raised tomato plants from seed.
zh: 他从种子开始种植番茄。

en: He tried many different methods.
zh: 他尝试了许多不同的方法。

en: He likes to hunt.
He likes hunting.
He is a man of ability.
He freely praised her.
zh: 他毫不吝啬地赞扬了她。

en: He produced a rabbit out of his hat by magic.
zh: 他变戏法从帽子里变出了一只兔子。

en: He amused the children by showing them some magic.
zh: 他表演魔术逗孩子们开心。

en: He is as ready to talk as to work.
zh: 他既喜欢说话也喜欢工作。

en: He bought books at random.
He listened to his CDs at random.
He asked questions at random.
He stood beside me without so much as helping me.
zh: 他站在我旁边，却一点也不帮我。

en: He answered in brief.
He is wearing gloves.
He was bound hand and foot.
He has submitted to an operation.
He decided to have the operation.
He tore up his letter into small bits and threw them out the window.
zh: 他把信撕成碎片，然后从窗户扔了出去。

en: He handed the letter to the secretary.
He went to the post office to mail the letter.
He has been writing a letter.
He will have been writing a letter.
He had been writing a letter.
He will have written a letter.
He has written a letter.
He wrote a letter.
He will be writing a letter.
He went to New York as soon as he got the letter.
zh: 他一收到信就去了纽约。

en: He threw the letter into the fire.
He shoved the letter into his pocket.
He neither wrote nor telephoned.
zh: 他既没有写信，也没有打电话。

en: He put a stamp on the letter.
He voiced his opinion in a letter to the Newsweek magazine.
zh: 他在给《新闻周刊》的信中表达了自己的观点。

en: He had three pieces of baggage.
He likes to play hardball with people.
He had a little piano on wheels, and a poor thin monkey which sat on top of it.
zh: 他有一架带轮子的小钢琴，上面坐着一只可怜的瘦猴子。

en: He made a lot of easy money.
zh: 他轻轻松松地赚了很多钱。

en: He warmed his hands.
He helped an old lady to get up from her seat.
zh: 他帮助一位老妇人从座位上站起来。

en: He helped an old lady get up from her seat.
zh: 他帮助一位老妇人从座位上站起来。

en: He waved me away.
He waved goodbye to us.
He reached for the book.
He reached out and took down a small leather bound book.
zh: 他伸出手，取下一本小小的皮革装订的书。

en: He reached out his hand for the knife, but it was too far away.
zh: 他伸手去拿刀，但太远了。

en: He reached his hand out, and tried to pick the fruit, but couldn't.
zh: 他伸出手，想摘那个水果，但够不着。

en: He raised his hand and smiled.
He rested his hand on my shoulder.
zh: 他把手放在我的肩膀上。

en: He really gets into anything he tries.
zh: 他对任何他尝试的事情都非常投入。

en: He held out his hand and I took it.
zh: 他伸出手，我握住了他的手。

en: He held out his hand.
He held on to my hand tightly.
He did not put up his hand.
He raised his hand.
He gave a blow with the flat of his hand.
He had a book in his hand.
He will accept any money he can get.
zh: 他会接受任何能得到的钱。

en: His hands were empty.
He was holding a pen in his hand.
He put a Band-Aid on his hand.
He came at me with a knife in his hand.
zh: 他手里拿着刀向我冲来。

en: He rubbed his eyes with his hands.
He used his hand to screen the sunlight from his eyes.
He was leaning against the rail.
He tried to grasp the rail.
He is clumsy with his hands.
He has big hands.
He's quick in forming relationships with women.
zh: 他很快就能和女性建立关系。

en: He's quick with girls.
He accompanies his words with blows.
zh: 他说话时会伴随着拳打脚踢。

en: He has a good hand.
He reads books at random.
He wrote a letter of inquiry to his business contact.
zh: 他给他的业务联系人写了一封询问信。

en: He made a favorable impression on his bank manager.
zh: 他给他的银行经理留下了良好的印象。

en: He is a hard man to approach.
zh: 他是一个难以接近的人。

en: He did a check on the quality.
He recoiled before his master's anger.
zh: 他在他主人的怒火面前退缩了。

en: He served his master well.
zh: 他很好地服侍了他的主人。
